publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1081 Dorothy-Grace Elder: Growing Concern and John Wheatley College-That the Parliament congratulates Peter McMahon of Growing Concern, Daldowie and the John Wheatley College, Easterhouse on Mr McMahon gaining the European Special Award for outstanding achievement by a student and records its high regard for the achievements of students, lecturers and social workers at Growing Concern and the John Wheatley College who have excelled at working through learning difficulties and given Scotland reason to be proud of their success.

S1M-1081 Dorothy-Grace Elder: Growing Concern and John Wheatley College-That the Parliament congratulates Peter McMahon of Growing Concern, Daldowie and the John Wheatley College, Easterhouse on Mr McMahon gaining the European Special Award for outstanding achievement by a student and records its high regard for the achievements of students, lecturers and social workers at Growing Concern and the John Wheatley College who have excelled at working through learning difficulties and given Scotland reason to be proud of their success.

S1M-1081 Dorothy-Grace Elder: Growing Concern and John Wheatley College-That the Parliament congratulates Peter McMahon of Growing Concern, Daldowie and the John Wheatley College, Easterhouse on Mr McMahon gaining the European Special Award for outstanding achievement by a student and records its high regard for the achievements of students, lecturers and social workers at Growing Concern and the John Wheatley College who have excelled at working through learning difficulties and given Scotland reason to be proud of their success.

S1M-1081 Dorothy-Grace Elder: Growing Concern and John Wheatley College-That the Parliament congratulates Peter McMahon of Growing Concern, Daldowie and the John Wheatley College, Easterhouse on Mr McMahon gaining the European Special Award for outstanding achievement by a student and records its high regard for the achievements of students, lecturers and social workers at Growing Concern and the John Wheatley College who have excelled at working through learning difficulties and given Scotland reason to be proud of their success.
S1M-1081 Growing Concern and John Wheatley College (lodged on 4 July 2000) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1081 Dorothy-Grace Elder: Growing Concern and John Wheatley College-That the Parliament congratulates Peter McMahon of Growing Concern, Daldowie and the John Wheatley College, Easterhouse on Mr McMahon gaining the European Special Award for outstanding achievement by a student and records its high regard for the achievements of students, lecturers and social workers at Growing Concern and the John Wheatley College who have excelled at working through learning difficulties and given Scotland reason to be proud of their success. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan
